name: 2D-3D Technologies
tagline: A blog for showing my experience in OpenCV, Computer Vision, Machine Learning
body:
I have more than 6 years of experience working on computer vision and image processing projects. Since last 3 years I am working with OpenCV library and I have worked on number of projects like object detection, object tracking, image matching, 3D scene reconstruction from multiple images, camera calibration, OCR, text detection, car number plate recognition etc.

This blog contains more comprehensive overview of the projects I have worked on.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
